00049 //
00050 // Extent
00051 //
00052 // 11 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_EXTENT_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_EXTENT_HPP
00057 
00058 struct Extent {
00059   int begin;
00060   int end;
00061 
00062   Extent() {}
00063   Extent( int b, int e ) : begin(b), end(e) {}
00064     
00065   bool contains( const Extent& other ) const {
00066     return begin <= other.begin && end >= other.end;
00067   }
00068 
00069   bool before( const Extent& other ) const {
00070     return end <= other.begin;
00071   }
00072 
00073   bool beginsBefore( const Extent& other ) const {
00074     return begin <= other.begin;
00075   }
00076 
00077   struct begins_before_less {
00078     bool operator() ( const Extent& one, const Extent& two ) const {
00079       return one.beginsBefore( two );
00080     }
00081   };
00082 };
00083 
00084 #endif // INDRI_EXTENT_HPP
Generated on Tue Nov 16 15:17:20 2004 for INDRI by 1.2.16
